data.title: Spain Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Spain with information about Spain time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
Current Local Time

Spain is in the Central European Time Zone

The Current Time in

Spain is:

Monday

8/19/2024

12:32 AM

UTC+02:00

Spain

is in the

Central European

Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Central European Time - is abbreviated as CET

Central European Summer Time - is abbreviated as CEST

UTC - GMT

Offset

Spain is GMT/UTC + 1h during Standard Time

Spain is GMT/UTC + 2h during Daylight Saving Time
